name: The Dicemancer
description:
Play as a wizard who has delved deep into some random ruins to find the legendary Rune Dice. Survive the onslaught of 10 waves of Goblins while flinging the Rune Dice around.

Made for the GMTK 2022 Game Jam!

Use WASD to move

Press the Left Mouse Button to pick up the Rune Dice

Let go of the Left Mouse Button to launch the Rune Dice

Use P to pause the game

Use the Escape key to exit the game

Rune 1: Become faster!
Rune 2: Create a circle of ice around the wizard!
Rune 3: Become more magical!
Rune 4: Create an explosion of fire on the Rune Dice!
Rune 5: Become stronger!
Rune 6: Create a circle of impaling rocks around the Rune Dice and the wizard!
